resources.string: Passcodes did not match. Please try again.
You have successfully created your 4-digit Passcode. The next time you enter the app you\'ll be asked to login with your new Passcode.
Remember, your Passcode is only enabled on this device. However, you can enable the same Passcode on other devices.
Don\'t worry, you can always log in with your User ID and Password at any time if you forget your Passcode.

You\'ve tried to log in too many times with the incorrect Passcode. To protect your account security, we\'ve disabled Passcode login for your account. The next time you are able to successfully log into the app, you can createa new Passcode.
Please contact Customer service at 1-877-742-7822 for assistance.
We know you\'re excited to get into the app, but you\'ve tried to log in with the wrong Passcode too many times. Please contact Customer service at 1-877-742-7822 for assistance.
Your Passcode Has been successfully updated! The next time you enter the app you\'ll be asked to log in with your updated Passcode.

string.name: passcode_dialog_updated_paragraph_2
string.b: If you have other Passcode-enabled devices, they have been updated wtih your new Passcode.

string.name: passcode_dialog_disabled_paragraph_1
string.b: Your passcode has been disabled on this device.

resources.string: The next time you enter the app you\'ll be asked to log in with your User ID and Password.
You may set up a new Passcode at anytime.
Your Passcode has been enabled on this device. The next time you enter the app you\'ll be asked to log in with this Passcode.
When creating your 4-digit Passcode please keep in mind these guidelines. Your Passcode cannot be any of the following:
• Your date of birth (MMDD or MMYY, i.e. 0116 or 0186)
• The last 4 digits of your Social Security Number
• The last 4 digits of your account number
• The street number on the account
• The first 4 digits of your credit card number (6011)
Create a 4-digit Passcode to log into your account safely and securely, even faster than using your User ID and Password.
You can easily update or disable your Passcode when you\'re logged into the app. Or, if you forget your Passcode, use your User ID and Password to login at any time.
Choose your 4-digit Passcode to use when you sign in.

string.name: passcode_disable_step1_header
string.Data: Please enter your current Passcode to disable it.

resources.string: Our records show that you have an existing Passcode enabled on other devices. In order to enable Pascode login on this device you must enter that same Passocde on this device.
Would you like to enable Passcode Login for this device?
Passcode has been previously set up on this device. It may have been created by another user or for a different account.
Do you want to remove Passcode from this device and proceed to create your own?
Your Passcode is currently enabled on this device.

string.name: passcode_enable_step2_header
string.Data: Please enter your current Passcode to enable it.

string.name: passcode_disable_step1_header
string.Data: Please enter your current Passcode to disable it.
